call_title: The Sigmanauts | qx(), Noah and Glasgow | Ergoversary Summit 2024

open_questions.question: What would be a successful Sigmanauts group by 2030
open_questions.context: Discussion about the ideal future state of the Sigmanauts organization

open_questions.question: How do we onboard the next 100 Sigmanauts and ensure diverse people with different ideas can work together effectively
open_questions.context: Growing pains and drama as the organization scales up

open_questions.question: How do we make traditional DeFi and gaming sexy in a world focused on meme speculation
open_questions.context: Making sustainable blockchain applications attractive versus speculative trading

key_facts.fact: There are about 60 Sigmanauts candidates and maybe 50-60 Sigmanauts, totaling about 100 people between Sigmanauts and candidates
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: An influencer was paid $30,000 from SNEK
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: There's 5,000 ERG attached to votes and 30,000 ERG in the treasury
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Emissions completely taper off and get into hard fork emissions in 2025 or 2026
key_facts.speaker: Noah

key_facts.fact: qx() sent Raro 15 or 12 ERG to make a cake for Ergo's birthday
key_facts.speaker: qx()
